name: SpyGuy
description:
Hello and welcome to SpyGuy ^-^ 

This project started just with me messing around with raylib and C#

I'm not a professional game developer or nothing but i tried to put some

Effort into this project so i hope you like it.

Here are the things you need to know before playing:

1 - The game is endless so you and your friend can decide the winning score using the points system as reference

2 - The objective of the spy is to either poison all tables or to kill all special guests (Guys with red t-shirts) within the given time (5 minutes)

3 - The objective of the sniper is to kill the spy or prevent him from completing his objectives in time 

4 - There is a 10% chance of the spy being disguised as a special guest 

5 - If the sniper kills an innocent special guest he loses the round instantly 

6 - The sniper has only 5 bullets and will lose if failing to shoot the spy before running out of ammo

7 - When the timer ends the spy still has to be shot, but a label will appear below the spy indicating who it is

8 - Shooting your rifle (Left mouse click) can kill all characters aligned with the shot

9 - If the spy player is having trouble finding his character he can ask for the sniper to close his eyes and press F to reveal his character location

10 - When the spy poisons a table a indicative sound will play (Windows error sound) and 3 seconds later the table sprite will change \n 

Sniper Controls:

Shoot - Left click

SpyRadar - Right click (When used, the spy radar will play a beep sound if the spy is touching the green circle displayed) \n

Spy Controls:

WASD - Move Spy 

Shift - Run (Faster when using the blackout or if the spy's time is up)

Space Bar - Blackout (Blacks the entire screen - 1min Cooldown)

E - Stab (Only works for specials guests) 

Q - Poison Table

Press Enter to Continue...
